name: ESTATE of Edna IRWIN, Deceased. Appeal of Bernard FISHER

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX, MANDERINO and LARSEN, JJ.
parties: ESTATE of Edna IRWIN, Deceased. Appeal of Bernard FISHER.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM:
Decree affirmed.
Each party pay own costs.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Alan J. Swotes, Herman J. Obert, Catherine Barone, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
387 A.2d 473
ESTATE of Edna IRWIN, Deceased. Appeal of Bernard FISHER.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 17, 1978.
Decided June 2, 1978.
Charles Polis, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Alan J. Swotes, Herman J. Obert, Catherine Barone, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX, MANDERINO and LARSEN, JJ.
